snippet: Crews worked Wednesday to seal an old oil and gas well off the Louisiana coast that began leaking during work to plug it permanently.
abstract: Crews work to seal old oil and gas well off Louisiana coast that began leaking during work to plug it permanently.
lead_paragraph: Crews worked Wednesday to seal an old oil and gas well off the Louisiana coast that began leaking during work to plug it permanently.

headline.main: Louisiana: Leaking Well Is Being Sealed
headline.print_headline: Louisiana: Leaking Well Is Being Sealed
